TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Soap12FaultCodes extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义在使用 SOAP 1.2 版协议与 XML Web services 进行通信期间发生错误时，显示在 SOAP 消息中的 SOAP 错误代码。

span.span: Defines the SOAP fault codes that appear in a SOAP message when an error occurs while communicating with XML Web services using the SOAP version 1.2 protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 规范版本1.2 中的 SOAP 错误包含一个 `Code` 元素，而其他项则是可选的 `Subcode` 元素。A SOAP fault in version 1.2 of the SOAP specification contains a `Code` element and among other things an optional `Subcode` element. `Code` 元素是一组预定义的代码，用于通知接收方导致错误的原因分为五个大错误类别之一。The `Code` element is one of a pre-defined set of codes that informs a recipient that the cause of the error fell into one of five large error categories. 这五个错误代码由 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 字段表示。Those five fault codes are represented by the , , , , and fields. `Subcode` 元素允许 SOAP 错误的发送方提供特定于应用程序的错误代码。The `Subcode` element allows the sender of the SOAP fault to provide an application-specific error code. ASP.NET 定义由 、、和 字段表示的四个这类代码。ASP.NET defines four such codes that are represented by the , , , and fields. 当创建 或 类的新实例时，引发异常的 XML Web service 将设置表示 `Code` 元素的 属性。An XML Web service throwing an exception sets the property, which represents the `Code` element, when a new instance of the or class is created. 该错误是作为 SOAP 错误在网络上传输的，.NET Framework 客户端可以将其作为 或 来捕获。That error is transmitted over the wire as a SOAP fault, which a .NET Framework client can catch as a or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误代码，用于指示 SOAP 消息所使用的编码格式无法识别。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault code indicating the SOAP message is encoded in an unrecognized format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 不会自动引发 属性设置为 的 。ASP.NET does not automatically throw a with the property set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName EncodingMissingIdFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly EncodingMissingIdFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 编码数据中缺少 ID 的错误代码。

span.span: Represents the fault code for missing ID in SOAP encoding data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误子代码，用于指示 SOAP 消息采用了 RPC 编码并且未指定编码图形节点的类型名称属性。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault subcode indicating that the SOAP message was RPC-encoded and the type name property of an encoded graph node was not specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 不会自动引发 属性设置为 的 。ASP.NET does not automatically throw a with the property set to . 类具有一个类型为 的 属性，该属性表示 SOAP 错误子代码。The class has a property of type that represents the SOAP fault subcode. 属性表示实际 SOAP 错误子代码的 URI。The property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode. 将 属性设置为 时，请将 属性设置为 。When setting the property to , set the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName MustUnderstandFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly MustUnderstandFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误代码，用于指示未处理用 特性标记的 SOAP 标头。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault code indicating a SOAP header marked with the attribute was not processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有 SOAP 标头都需要接收方进行处理。Not all SOAP headers require processing by the recipient. 但是，如果 SOAP 标头标记为 `MustUnderstand` 特性等于 "true"，则需要进行处理。However, if a SOAP header is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute equal to "true", processing is required. 当标头位于 SOAP 1.2 请求中时，无法处理该标头将生成 ，并将 属性设置为 。Failure to process the header when it resides within a SOAP 1.2 request generates a with the property set to . 如果 SOAP 请求驻留在 SOAP 1.1 请求中，则 属性设置为 。If the SOAP request resided within a SOAP 1.1 request, the property is set to . SOAP 1.1 和1.2 都定义 `MustUnderstand` SOAP 错误代码，该代码仅与用于发送 SOAP 消息的 SOAP 协议的版本不同。Both SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 define `MustUnderstand` SOAP fault codes differing only by the version of the SOAP protocol used to send the SOAP message. 此字段表示 SOAP 1.2 版本，SOAP 1.1 版本由 表示。This field represents the SOAP 1.2 version, and the SOAP 1.1 version is represented by . 这两个字段映射到不同的限定名称，但你可以通过调用 方法来检查 属性是否是一个错误代码。The two fields map to different qualified names, but you can check whether the property is either one of the fault codes by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName ReceiverFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly ReceiverFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误代码，用于指示在处理客户端对服务器的调用期间因接收方出现问题而发生的错误。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault code indicating an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server due to a problem with the recipient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用服务器并且由于网络问题而无法响应请求时，将引发 ，并将 属性设置为 ""。A is thrown with the property set to when a server is called and it could not respond to a request due to network problems. 通常，对于这种类型的异常，客户端调用以后可能会成功。Typically, with this type of exception, the client call may succeed later. `Receiver` SOAP 错误代码类似于 `Server` 错误代码，该代码由 字段表示，但在使用 SOAP 1.1 发送 SOAP 请求时，将使用 `Server` 错误代码。The `Receiver` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Server` fault code, which is represented by the field, but the `Server` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1. 若要检查 属性是 `Receiver` 还是 `Server` SOAP 错误代码，请调用 方法。To check whether the property is either the `Receiver` or `Server` SOAP fault codes, call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误子代码，用于指示发送到 XML Web services 方法的参数不正确或未能分析。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault subcode indicating that arguments sent to the XML Web service method were incorrect or could not be parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 不会自动引发 属性设置为 的 。ASP.NET does not automatically throw a with the property set to . 类具有一个类型为 的 属性，该属性表示 SOAP 错误子代码。The class has a property of type that represents the SOAP fault subcode. 属性表示实际 SOAP 错误子代码的 URI。The property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode. 将 属性设置为 时，请将 属性设置为 。When setting the property to , set the property to .

Public Shared ReadOnly RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误子代码，用于指示 XML Web services 不支持请求的 XML Web services 方法。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault subcode indicating the XML Web service does not support the requested XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 不会自动引发 属性设置为 的 。ASP.NET does not automatically throw a with the property set to . 类具有一个类型为 的 属性，该属性表示 SOAP 错误子代码。The class has a property of type that represents the SOAP fault subcode. 属性表示实际 SOAP 错误子代码的 URI。The property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode. 将 属性设置为 时，请将 属性设置为 。When setting the property to , set the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName SenderFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly SenderFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误代码，用于指示客户端调用的格式不正确或者没有包含适当的信息。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault code indicating a client call was not formatted correctly or did not contain the appropriate information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 SOAP 1.2 请求格式不正确或缺少参数时，将引发 ，并将 属性设置为 。A is thrown with the property set to when a SOAP 1.2 request is malformed or a parameter is missing. `Sender` SOAP 错误代码类似于 `Client` 错误代码，该代码由 字段表示，但在使用 SOAP 1.1 发送 SOAP 请求时，将使用 `Client` 错误代码。The `Sender` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Client` fault code, which is represented by the field, but the `Client` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1. 若要检查 属性是 `Sender` 还是 `Client` SOAP 错误代码，请调用 方法。To check whether the property is either the `Sender` or `Client` SOAP fault codes, call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName VersionMismatchFaultCode
Public Shared ReadOnly VersionMismatchFaultCode As XmlQualifiedName

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 1.2 版 错误代码，用于指示 XML Web services 希望接收符合 SOAP 1.2 规范的 SOAP 消息，但收到一条符合 SOAP 1.1 规范的 SOAP 消息。

span.span: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 fault code indicating the XML Web service expected SOAP messages conforming to the SOAP 1.2 specification, yet received one conforming to SOAP 1.1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web service 配置为仅接受 SOAP 1.2 请求并收到 SOAP 1.1 消息，则会引发 ，并将 属性设置为 ""。A is thrown with the property set to when an XML Web service is configured to only accept SOAP 1.2 requests and it receives a SOAP 1.1 message. 同样，如果 XML Web service 配置为仅接受 SOAP 1.1 消息，并收到 SOAP 1.2 消息，则会引发 并将 属性设置为 ""。Likewise, if an XML Web service is configured to accept only SOAP 1.1 messages and it receives a SOAP 1.2 message, a is thrown with the property set to . 有关配置 XML Web services 的详细信息，请参阅[使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services 的配置选项](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b2c0ew36(v=vs.100))。For details on configuring XML Web services, see [Configuration Options for XML Web Services Created Using ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b2c0ew36(v=vs.100)). SOAP 1.1 和1.2 都定义 `VersionMismatch` SOAP 错误代码，这些代码在所需的 SOAP 协议版本上有所不同。Both SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 define `VersionMismatch` SOAP fault codes that differ on the version of the SOAP protocol expected. 此字段表示 SOAP 1.2 版本，而 SOAP 1.1 版本由 表示。This field represents the SOAP 1.2 version, whereas the SOAP 1.1 version is represented by . 这两个字段映射到不同的限定名称，但你可以通过调用 方法来检查 属性是否是一个错误代码。The two fields map to different qualified names, but you can check whether the property is either one of the fault codes by calling the method.
